(UNITURN mérőállomás kártyaolvasó)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_kartyaolcvaso.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f700

safetop0.250
safebottom0.250
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.0045

fmax700
fmin400
fratio0.6

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.03 #furatok
c2 = 0.04 #letörések
c3 = 0.05 #keret

(piZero furatok)
b corners 3.5,13.5 size58,23 d3 z$z1 c$c1 d2.75 jg0.05

h 3.5,5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2
h 61.5,5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2

#h 70,5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2
#h 70,13.5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2

#h 70,36.5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2

(körvonal)
#b outline 0,0 size75,40 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r3
b outline 0,0 size65,40 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r3

b inline 7,0 size51.5,10 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r4 rj2 nl1,1,1,0

#b inline 65,17 size10,16 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r4 rj2 nl1,1,0,1
